pkgmetadata.longdescription: Python Interface to NKF21. How to Install Install from PyPI: $ sudo pip install nkf Install from source tree: $ make $ sudo make install2. Usage ## flag is same as the flags of nkf itself import nkf output = nkf.nkf(flag, input) ## For example, to convert from euc-jp to utf-8 output = nkf.nkf('-Ew', 'some euc-jp string')3. guess() function, which guesses input_string_code and returns one of next strings: "BINARY" "ASCII" "Shift_JIS" "CP932" "EUC-JP" "EUCJP-MS" "CP51932" "ISO-2022-JP" "CP50221" "CP50220" "UTF-8" "UTF-16" "UTF-32" ## For example import nkf input_code = nkf.guess('some string')
